original_title: Fest Selects: Best Lesbian Shorts: Vol. 1
overview: From the high price of dildos in Kate Brandt's "Tools 4 Fools" to an apocalyptic break-up rendered hysterically funny in Chris Russo's "25 Random Things I Did During My Big Fat Lesbian Depression," these shorts depict life from a lesbian perspective.
title: Fest Selects: Best Lesbian Shorts: Vol. 1
